Here, you can let your voice be heard and your tokens be counted on any issue. You can show support for any proposal or comment, or start your own initiative to see if it is widely supported! Join us in our effort to help the EOS better communicate, with on-chain discussions, which can lead to referenda, worker proposals, changes to the constitution, system contracts or simply gauging the support for your ideas. Use your stake to make your opinion count!
